name: qrdrop
description: A two-way LAN file-sharing CLI tool built with Bun

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && node -e "const p=process.platform;const ext=p==='win32'?'.exe':'';const cmd='bun build --compile index.ts --outfile dist/qrdrop'+ext+' --minify'+(p==='win32'?' --windows-hide-console':'');require('child_process').execSync(cmd,{stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.build:windows: echo 'Note: build:windows only works on Windows. Use "bun run build" on Windows instead.'
